scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=dev LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.start:sit: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=sit LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.start:uat: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=uat LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.start:grey: cross-env NODE_ENV=development SERVER_ENV=grey LOCAL=true webpack-dev-server --mode development --open --progress
scripts.pub:dev: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:dev && publish-sit -S DEV
scripts.pub:sit: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No LOCAL=true npm run build:sit && publish-sit
scripts.pub:uat: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:uat && publish-sit -S UAT
scripts.pub:grey: cross-env USE_ANALYZER=No npm run build:grey && publish-sit -S GREY
